alert.note: Alert for Osceola; Southern Brevard County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 6:43AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Reducing Visibilities Across Osceola and Southern Brevard Counties... Surface observations, traffic cameras and satellite imagery indicate that patchy dense fog, producing visibilities of a quarter of a mile or less, has spread northward across portions of Osceola and southern Brevard counties early this morning, especially near to west of Interstate 95 and across Florida`s Turnpike. This fog is expected to persist across this area through sunrise, then dissipate shortly after 8 AM. Motorists on area roadways in these counties should prepare to encounter reduced visibilities due to the fog. When driving in fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
